properties.areaDesc: Greene, GA; Oconee, GA; Clarke, GA
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 9 at 11:34AM EST until February 10 at 5:24AM EST by NWS Peachtree City GA
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in
Georgia...

Oconee River near Milledgeville affecting Baldwin...Washington and
Wilkinson Counties

Ogeechee River near Grange affecting Jefferson and Washington
Counties


...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia...

Ocmulgee River near Macon affecting Bibb...Houston...Jones...
Monroe and Twiggs Counties

Oconee River near Penfield affecting Clarke...Greene and Oconee
Counties

Oconee River near Oconee affecting Johnson...Washington and
Wilkinson Counties


...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia...
Ocmulgee River near Abbeville affecting Dodge...Telfair and Wilcox
Counties

Oconee River near Oconee affecting Washington and Wilkinson
Counties

Oconee River near Dublin affecting Johnson...Laurens...Washington
and Wilkinson Counties

NWSheadline: Flood Warning extended until late tonight...The Flood Warning continues for The Oconee River near Penfield. * Until late tonight. * At 11AM Sunday the stage was 16.3 feet...and falling. * Minor flooding is occurring and is forecast. * Flood stage is 13.0 feet. * The river will continue to fall to below flood stage by tonight. * At 17.0 feet...Minor flooding continues to expand into fields
